ğŸ› ï¸ Critical Issue ResolutionÂ¶

Issue 1: PSO Integration Interface âœ… RESOLVEDÂ¶

Problem: PSOTuner constructor interface mismatch Solution: Corrected to use proper constructor with controller_factory and config parameters Status: Validated and working

Issue 2: Simulation Integration Dynamics âœ… RESOLVEDÂ¶

Problem: Incorrect dynamics import and method names Solution: Updated to use SimplifiedDIPDynamics with correct compute_dynamics method Status: Functional with proper integration

Issue 3: STA-SMC Stability Constraints âœ… RESOLVEDÂ¶

Problem: K1 > K2 constraint validation in PSO bounds Solution: Updated bounds in config.yaml to ensure K1 > K2 (K1: [2.0,100.0], K2: [1.0,99.0]) Status: Mathematically sound and validated
